title: AdS_3 Asymptotic (super)symmetries
abstract: The Chern-Simons formulation of $AdS_3$ supergravity is considered. Asymptotic conditions on the Rarita-Schwinger fields are given. Together with the known boundary conditions on the bosonic fields, these ensure that the asymptotic algebra is the superconformal algebra, with the same central charge as the one of pure gravity. It is also indicated that the asymptotic dynamics is described by super-Liouville.
